html: 2 million people will have their access to food threatened if the @HouseGOP passes their hyper-partisan #FarmBill. That’s beyond unjust. We should strengthen and #ProtectSNAP — the most effective anti-hunger program in US history — not put Americans at risk of going hungry.
text:
2 million people will have their access to food threatened if the @HouseGOP passes their hyper-partisan #FarmBill.

That’s beyond unjust.

We should strengthen and #ProtectSNAP — the most effective anti-hunger program in US history — not put Americans at risk of going hungry.

html: A real problem @POTUS hasn't addressed: the millions of gallons of sewage flowing from Mexico into our beaches. I introduced two bills to stop the spills. Imperial Beach & Chula Vista have filed lawsuits. @AGBecerra & @SDWaterBoard are threating to sue. Will @POTUS do something?
text:
A real problem @POTUS hasn't addressed: the millions of gallons of sewage flowing from Mexico into our beaches. 
I introduced two bills to stop the spills. Imperial Beach & Chula Vista have filed lawsuits. @AGBecerra & @SDWaterBoard are threating to sue. Will @POTUS do something?

html: Congress must pass the #PaycheckFairnessAct to help give women in the workforce the tools they need to combat wage discrimination. It's time to guarantee equal pay for equal work once and for all! #EqualPayDay
text: Congress must pass the #PaycheckFairnessAct to help give women in the workforce the tools they need to combat wage discrimination. It's time to guarantee equal pay for equal work once and for all! #EqualPayDay

html: On average, women earn 80 cents for every $1 a white, non-Hispanic man earns, and the #wagegap is much larger for women of color: -Black women earn only 63 cents for every $1 -Native women earn only 57 cents for every $1 -Latinas earn only 54 cents for every $1 #EqualPayDaypic.twitter.com/t1tBPrSht6
text:
On average, women earn 80 cents for every $1 a white, non-Hispanic man earns, and the #wagegap is much larger for women of color:
-Black women earn only 63 cents for every $1
-Native women earn only 57 cents for every $1
-Latinas earn only 54 cents for every $1
#EqualPayDaypic.twitter.com/t1tBPrSht6

html: #EqualPayDay recognizes that women must work 3 extra months just to earn the same pay as men! Closing the #GenderWageGap can help women's paychecks, families & the economy. Congress should help make workplaces safe&equal by passing the Paycheck Fairness Act. RT if you agree!pic.twitter.com/omIbWWyO9E
text: #EqualPayDay recognizes that women must work 3 extra months just to earn the same pay as men! Closing the #GenderWageGap can help women's paychecks, families & the economy.
